\begin{figure}[!htb]
\begin{center}
\begin{tikzpicture}[xscale = 0.5, yscale = 0.5]
%
%
\draw
[
	variable	= x,			% default = x
	color		= black,		%
	domain		= -10:10,		%
	samples		= 1000,			% number of samples
	samples at	{1, 3, 4, 9}	%
]
%
%
plot[id=gauss, smooth, tension=1]
%
% other parameters that can be used:
% parametric	write the function as: function(f(t), g(t))
% id			name of the relative .table file generated by gnuplot
% prefix		prefiz of the relative .table file (example: prefix = ../images/tables/)
% mark			marks kind
% mark repeat	plot marks every...
% mark phase	initial phase (for 'mark repeat' option)
% mark indices	which marks should be plotted (example: mark indices = {1, 2, 4, 19})
% mark size		marks dimension
% mark options	marks options (example: mark options = {color=blue, rotate=180})
% sharp plot
% smooth
% tension
% smooth cycle
% ycomb			bar plot in y-dimension
% xcomb			bar plot in y-dimension
% polar comb	bar plot in polar-dimension
% only marks	
%
%
function{1 / (sqrt(2 * 3.1415)) * exp( - ((x - 1)**2) / (2**2))}		% or file{filepath.table}
node[right]
{aereoplane};
%
%
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{center}
\end{figure}
